build.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl && curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_20.x | bash - && apt-get install -y nodejs build-essential && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput --no-input

deploy.startCommand: sh -c 'python manage.py migrate --no-input && gunicorn --timeout 120 --workers=1 --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT storefront.wsgi:application & celery -A storefront worker --loglevel=info & celery -A storefront beat --loglevel=info'
